title: Thunder Soldier's True Identity
theoryText: The Thunder Soldier who helps Franky is not just a random toy in Dressrosa - he has a deep connection to Rebecca, as evidenced by her calling out to him. Many fans theorized that Thunder Soldier was once human and might be Rebecca's father or guardian, transformed into a toy by Doflamingo's crew. The way Rebecca recognizes him suggests a long-standing relationship.
author: Various One Piece fans (2014)
statusExplanation: Later confirmed that Thunder Soldier is Kyros, Rebecca's father and a legendary gladiator who was turned into a toy.

title: Revolutionary Army After the Mera Mera no Mi
theoryText: The presence of Hack, a fish-man from the Revolutionary Army, at the tournament suggested that the Revolutionary Army had interest in obtaining the Mera Mera no Mi. Some fans theorized that the Revolutionary Army might send a major player to compete for Ace's fruit, possibly even Sabo if he were still alive.
author: One Piece community (2014)
statusExplanation: Sabo, the Revolutionary Army's Chief of Staff, later appears and wins the Mera Mera no Mi, inheriting Ace's legacy.

title: Bartolomeo is a Luffy Fanboy
theoryText: Based on Bartolomeo's reputation and his presence at the tournament, some fans theorized that despite his fearsome 'Cannibal' reputation, Bartolomeo might actually be a fan of Luffy or the Straw Hats. His participation in the tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi (connected to Luffy's brother Ace) suggested he might have deeper motives than just obtaining a powerful Devil Fruit.
author: One Piece fans (2014)
statusExplanation: Bartolomeo is revealed to be Luffy's biggest fan, inspired by witnessing Luffy's execution attempt at Loguetown. He later forms the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

title: Cavendish's Dual Personality
theoryText: Cavendish's introduction as the beautiful and charismatic 'Pirate Prince' led some fans to speculate that there might be more to his character than meets the eye. His initial friendliness to Lucy while harboring hatred for the Worst Generation suggested internal conflict, and some theorized he might have a split personality or hidden dark side.
author: One Piece community
statusExplanation: Cavendish is later revealed to have a split personality named Hakuba, a violent alter ego that takes over when he sleeps.

title: Dressrosa's Toy Factory Secret
theoryText: Franky's questioning of Thunder Soldier about the Donquixote family's factory led fans to theorize that the toys in Dressrosa are not naturally alive, but are actually humans transformed by a Devil Fruit ability. The factory might be connected to this transformation, and Doflamingo could be using these transformed humans as slave labor.
author: One Piece theorists (2014)
statusExplanation: Confirmed that Sugar's Hobi Hobi no Mi Devil Fruit turns humans into toys, erasing memories of them. The factory produces SMILE artificial Devil Fruits using toy slaves.

title: Lucy's Identity Will Be Discovered
theoryText: Given Luffy's impulsive nature and the high-profile nature of the tournament, fans immediately theorized that Luffy's 'Lucy' disguise would eventually be discovered, either through his fighting style, his inability to keep quiet about being the future Pirate King, or recognition by other competitors who know him.
author: One Piece fans
statusExplanation: Multiple competitors eventually discover that Lucy is Luffy, and his identity becomes increasingly difficult to hide as the tournament progresses.
